title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.10 - Removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.10 - Removal

State Regulations

The owner or operator thereof shall be responsible for the
prompt removal of aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle wrecked or disabled at
an air, marine or bus terminal as directed by the manager. In the event of his
failure to comply with such directions, such wrecked or disabled aircraft, watercraft or motor vehicle may be removed by the authority at the owner's or
operator's expense and without liability for damage which may result in the
course of such removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1155.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
